excerpt: This museum dedicated to the famed Titanic is shaped like the ship & features recovered artifacts.
detail_description: The TITANIC Museum Attraction in Pigeon Forge offers an immersive experience dedicated to the famous ship. Shaped like the Titanic itself, the museum features recovered artifacts and interactive exhibits that change annually, focusing on different aspects of the passengers and the ship. Visitors receive a ticket representing a real-life passenger at the start of their journey. Inside, there are replicas of staterooms and dining halls with stunning architectural details matching those of the original Titanic.
name: Titanic Museum Attraction

excerpt: This popular road in the city center is filled with restaurants, stores, hotels & amusement centers.
detail_description: The Island Dr is a bustling hub in the heart of the city, offering an array of dining options, retail stores, accommodations, and entertainment venues. One of its main attractions is Margaritaville's St. Somewhere Spa, where visitors can indulge in custom treatments such as Volcano Hot Stone Massage and Signature Key Lime Margarita Spa Manicure. Additionally, The Island features the Great Smoky Mountain Wheel, providing breathtaking views from its 200-foot-tall structure.
name: The Island Dr

excerpt: Museum displaying exhibits on American crimes, from the Old West to modern serial killers.
detail_description: Alcatraz East Crime Museum is a 25,000-square-foot museum located in The Island in Pigeon Forge. It features five galleries that cover the history of American crime, crime scene investigation, the consequences of crime, crime fighting, and pop culture. The museum showcases over 100 interactive exhibits and artifacts related to notorious criminals such as Al Capone and John Dillinger.
name: Alcatraz East Crime Museum

excerpt: Visitors can view & pose for photos with sculpted replicas of film stars at this attraction.
detail_description: Located in Pigeon Forge, the Hollywood Wax Museum is a must-visit attraction for movie enthusiasts. The museum showcases incredibly lifelike wax figures of iconic celebrities from classic film stars to today's A-listers. Visitors can walk the red carpet and pose with their favorite stars, creating memorable photo opportunities. The museum also features cool props to enhance the experience.
name: Hollywood Wax Museum
address: 106 Showplace Blvd A, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: Amusement park offering zorbing on 4 different tracks, including zig-zag & downhill courses.
detail_description: Outdoor Gravity Park in Pigeon Forge is an amusement park that offers a unique adventure known as zorbing. This one-of-a-kind attraction allows visitors to climb into a giant, transparent ball and roll down different hillside tracks, experiencing the exhilaration of zorbing. With various tracks to choose from, including zig-zag and downhill courses, Outdoor Gravity Park provides plenty of laughs and excitement for families.
name: Outdoor Gravity Park
address: 203 Sugar Hollow Rd, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: Homestyle dinner feast followed by a farcical musical revue with dancing & comedy.
detail_description: The Hatfield & McCoy Dinner Feud is a unique dinner show that features a comedic musical revue alongside a delicious homestyle feast. The production, created by the same company behind the Comedy Barn, brings to life the legendary feud between the Hatfield and McCoy families through mountain-style competitions, song and dance numbers, feats of strength, stunts, comedy routines, and even platform diving.
name: Hatfield & McCoy Dinner Feud
address: 119 Music Rd, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: Unique, mile-long downhill roller coaster where riders control velocity & braking.
detail_description: Nestled in the Great Smoky Mountain National Park area, the Smoky Mountain Alpine Coaster is a must-visit attraction. This unique mile-long roller coaster offers an exhilarating experience as riders have control over their speed and braking. The coaster descends 363 feet over a mile, reaching speeds of up to 27 miles per hour. What sets it apart is that each car has its own brakes, allowing riders to customize their ride experience.
name: Smoky Mountain Alpine Coaster
address: 867 Wears Valley Rd, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: Large venue for family-friendly variety shows featuring live music, comedy & dancing.
detail_description: Country Tonite is a popular theater in Pigeon Forge known for its family-friendly variety shows. The high-energy revue features the greatest hits of country music, along with comedy, gospel music, and patriotic tunes. The talented cast of singers and dancers delivers toe-tapping renditions of classic country hits and today's chart-toppers. Hosted by Kevin Wilson and featuring comic relief from Bubba The Redneck Ranger, the show offers non-stop entertainment for all ages.
name: Country Tonite
address: 129 Showplace Blvd, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: Family-friendly comedic show features performing animals, magicians, jugglers, music & more.
detail_description: Situated on the Parkway in Pigeon Forge, the Comedy Barn Theater has been entertaining families for over 25 years with its clean and family-friendly comedy. This renowned theater boasts a diverse lineup of entertainment, featuring ventriloquists, jugglers, magicians, singers, trained animals, and top comedians from around the country. With over seven million visitors and nightly standing ovations, this show promises large doses of humor and non-stop laughter.
name: Comedy Barn Theater

detail_description: WonderWorks is a popular attraction that offers an array of interactive exhibits and experiences for visitors. Situated within a short driving distance from other top attractions, this unique destination provides entertainment and educational opportunities for all ages. With its engaging displays and hands-on activities, WonderWorks promises an enjoyable experience for families and individuals alike.
name: Wonderworks

excerpt: Year-round indoor snow park with tubing slides & an open play area, plus a snack bar.
detail_description: Pigeon Forge Snow is a year-round indoor snow park offering an exciting snow tubing experience for the whole family. With fresh snow made daily, visitors can enjoy tubing down multiple slopes as many times as they want with hourly passes. The climate-controlled environment ensures a comfortable temperature of 60-70 degrees Fahrenheit, allowing for endless fun in the snow play area where one can build snowmen and forts.
name: Pigeon Forge Snow
address: 2533 Teaster Ln, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

detail_description: The Old Mill Square in Gatlinburg, Tennessee is a charming and picturesque shopping district that offers visitors a unique and memorable experience. Nestled just past traffic light #6, The Village Shops feature 27 distinct shops and eateries set in a quaint European village-themed atmosphere. Visitors can immerse themselves in the ambiance of a bygone era while perusing an array of items and clothing, creating an enjoyable shopping experience.
name: The Old Mill Square
address: Old Mill St, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: Peaceful Bible-inspired garden & parrot preserve offering chances to interact with rare birds.
detail_description: Parrot Mountain and Gardens is a serene sanctuary and parrot sanctuary that offers the opportunity to engage with exotic birds. Nestled in the Smokies, this unique nature preserve is home to a wide array of tropical birds. Visitors can enjoy conversing with chatty parrots, feeding lorikeets, and capturing moments with vibrant feathered companions. The site also boasts a nursery where guests can interact with adorable baby birds and consider adopting one as a pet.
name: Parrot Mountain and Gardens
address: 1471 McCarter Hollow Rd, Pigeon Forge, TN 37862, USA

excerpt: Popular arena featuring a trampoline park, arcade, climbing & ninja courses, VR games & concessions.
detail_description: TopJump Trampoline & Extreme Arena in Pigeon Forge, TN is an exciting destination offering a variety of activities for all ages. From trampolines and climbing courses to VR games and an arcade, there's something for everyone. The arena features open jump areas, a fire and ice ninja course, basketball dodgeball, wall climbing, obstacle racing, car racing, and more. Additionally, visitors can enjoy the Sugar Rush Candy Store for sweet treats.
name: TopJump Trampoline & Extreme Arena

excerpt: Family amusement park with log-rolling, sawing & chopping contests, zip lines & a high ropes course.
detail_description: Paula Deen's Lumberjack Feud Supper Show is a family-friendly amusement park featuring thrilling lumberjack competitions and interactive experiences. The show showcases real-life lumberjack athletes competing in classic events such as log rolling, speed climbing, axe throwing, and more. The outdoor venue includes water features and climbing poles while providing covered seating for the audience. In addition to the main show, guests can participate in an interactive lumberjack experience to try their hand at various lumberjack skills.
name: Paula Deen's Lumberjack Feud Supper Show

excerpt: Southern, 4-course feast followed by a show featuring music, comedy, live animals & pyrotechnics.
detail_description: Dolly Parton's Stampede in Tennessee offers a unique experience with a 4-course feast followed by a show featuring music, comedy, live animals, and pyrotechnics. The attraction showcases magnificent horses and top-notch riders performing thrilling stunts. Guests can enjoy friendly North and South competition, jaw-dropping special effects, and amazing musical productions while indulging in a delicious meal.
name: Dolly Parton's Stampede

excerpt: Patrons use virtual magic wands to solve puzzles as they walk through a hi-tech fantasy game.
detail_description: MagiQuest is a popular winter attraction in Pigeon Forge, featuring a massive medieval castle with four indoor activities. Visitors can embark on a fantasy role-playing adventure using virtual magic wands to solve puzzles and battle dragons. Additionally, they can explore the world's largest mirror maze, take on a Mission Impossible-style laser challenge, and enjoy blacklight mini golf. Kids can engage in live action role play (LARP-ing) to defend their fellowship against evil within the castle.
name: MagiQuest

excerpt: Family-friendly attraction with candy-themed indoor & outdoor mini-golf, plus escape rooms & snacks.
detail_description: Crave Golf Club in Pigeon Forge is a family-friendly destination offering candy-themed indoor and outdoor mini-golf, along with escape rooms and snacks. The indoor course takes players through a dreamland of cocoa cliffs, ice cream canyons, and a sugar safari, complete with delectable obstacles. Meanwhile, the rooftop mini golf course features 19 holes winding through environments like Rock Candy Mountain and Jellybean Jungle.
name: Crave Golf Club

excerpt: 1830 gristmill anchors a complex with 2 country cooking eateries plus pottery, candy & toy shops.
detail_description: Nestled in a complex with country cooking eateries, pottery, candy, and toy shops, The Old Mill Restaurant is a haven for soul-satisfying Southern comfort food. It's renowned as one of the most popular restaurants in the Great Smokies region. Despite potential wait times, visitors are assured that their breakfast will be worth it. The restaurant is known for serving insanely large portions and is recommended for those with hearty appetites.
name: The Old Mill Restaurant
address: 164 Old Mill Ave, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: Sprawling, multi-level family fun center with race track, arcade games, mini-golf & bumper cars.
detail_description: The Track in Pigeon Forge is a sprawling family fun center offering a variety of activities for all ages. It features an exciting race track, arcade games, mini-golf, bumper cars, and elevated go-kart tracks that take you up 3.5 stories before zooming back down with a surprising drop at the bottom. Additionally, visitors can enjoy attractions such as Blaster Boats, Skyflyer, and the Surfin Safari miniature golf course.
name: The Track - Pigeon Forge

excerpt: Seasonal 35-acre water park owned & inspired by singer Dolly Parton, featuring many water slides.
detail_description: Dollywood's Splash Country is a 35-acre water park inspired by Dolly Parton, offering a variety of water slides. Located near the Great Smoky Mountains, it's conveniently close to several attractions and annual events. The park provides free admission for kids under 3 and features kid-friendly areas like Little Creek Falls with shallow pools and fun slides, as well as The Cascades where children can explore hidden misters, bubblers, and slides in secret coves around the pool perimeter.
name: Dollywood's Splash Country
address: 2700 Dollywood Parks Blvd, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: Large venue with laser-tag, black-light mini-golf, arcade & an outdoor downhill go-kart track.
detail_description: LazerPort Fun Center in Pigeon Forge is a sprawling entertainment complex that offers an array of thrilling activities for visitors of all ages. The center boasts the city's tallest go-kart track, featuring roller-coaster style drops and twists before plunging down a 40-foot hill. Additionally, guests can enjoy an expansive indoor laser tag arena with ramps, obstacles, and ample hiding spots across its two-story course.
name: LazerPort Fun Center

detail_description: Flyaway Indoor Skydiving in Pigeon Forge offers a unique experience with its vertical wind tunnel that simulates the feeling of free falling without having to jump out of an airplane. Visitors can enjoy indoor skydiving lessons and observe the thrilling activity from an observation deck. The attraction's friendly staff provides all the necessary instructions, making it suitable for beginners.
name: Flyaway Indoor Skydiving

excerpt: Pigeon Forge, a mountain town and vacation area in eastern Tennessee, is the home of Dollywood, country singer Dolly Partons Appalachian-themed park consisting of rides, an adjoining water park and a museum of her costumes and memorabilia. The citys other attractions include country music revues like the Smoky Mountain Opry, dinner theaters such as Dolly Parton's Dixie Stampede and outlet malls.
detail_description: Pigeon Forge, located in eastern Tennessee, is a charming mountain town known for its array of attractions. One of the highlights is Dollywood, an Appalachian-themed amusement park founded by country singer Dolly Parton. Visitors can enjoy rides, a water park, and a museum showcasing Parton's costumes and memorabilia. The city also offers entertainment options such as country music revues at venues like the Smoky Mountain Opry and dinner theaters including Dolly Parton's Dixie Stampede.
name: Pigeon Forge

excerpt: Adventure park featuring multiple zip line tours & an advanced level for experienced riders.
detail_description: If you're seeking an exhilarating adventure in the heart of Pigeon Forge, look no further than Smoky Mountain Ziplines. This thrilling park features a variety of zip line tours, including an advanced option for seasoned riders looking to push their limits. Just a short drive from Gatlinburg, it's easily accessible via U.S. 321/441 Spur.
name: Smoky Mountain Ziplines
address: 509 Mill Creek Rd, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

detail_description: Goats On The Roof is a unique attraction in the Great Smoky Mountains where live goats roam on the rooftop. It offers more than just goat feeding, featuring an old-time gem mine, a well-stocked gift shop with souvenirs and Amish delicacies, as well as ice cream and homemade fudges. Additionally, it boasts a thrilling 4,375-feet long mountain coaster that reaches speeds of 30 miles per hour.
name: Goats On The Roof

excerpt: Rider-controlled alpine coaster with 4 uplifts, tunnels & illuminated nighttime rides.
detail_description: Rocky Top Mountain Coaster in Pigeon Forge, Tennessee offers an exhilarating rider-controlled alpine coaster experience. It boasts 4 separate uphill lift sections, tunnels, and stunning Smoky Mountain scenery. The coaster is known for its 9-minute ride duration and nighttime illuminations that create a magical atmosphere. With a military discount and the ability to enjoy both day and night rides, it's a must-visit attraction for families and thrill-seekers alike.
name: Rocky Top Mountain Coaster
address: 2940 Veterans Blvd, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: 200-ft.-tall ferris wheel with glass gondolas, offering sweeping views of the water & mountains.
detail_description: The Great Smoky Mountain Wheel is a breathtaking 200-foot-tall Ferris wheel that stands as the highlight of The Island in Pigeon Forge. This remarkable attraction features all-glass gondolas, allowing visitors to enjoy unobstructed views of the stunning Smoky Mountains and picturesque waters below. Perfect for families and friends, each gondola accommodates up to eight guests, making it an ideal spot for creating unforgettable memories together.
name: The Great Smoky Mountain Wheel
address: 131 The Island Dr, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: Attraction with 100+ hands-on science exhibits, plus laser tag, a ropes course & a 4D motion ride.
detail_description: WonderWorks Pigeon Forge is an attraction featuring over 100 hands-on science exhibits, as well as activities like laser tag, a ropes course, and a 4D motion ride. Located in close proximity to various popular attractions such as the Great Smoky Mountains, Dollywood/Splash Country, and Titanic Museum, it offers convenient access to the region's main highlights.
name: WonderWorks Pigeon Forge
address: 100 Music Rd, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

detail_description: Nestled just a short drive from the bustling Pigeon Forge Parkway, Big Rock Dude Ranch at Ponderosa LLC offers an unforgettable escape into the heart of nature. This hidden gem is perfect for families seeking adventure and tranquility alike. With its stunning 3.5-mile mountain trail rides, you can immerse yourself in the beauty of the Smokies while enjoying a unique horseback riding experience that transports you back to simpler times.
name: Big Rock Dude Ranch at Ponderosa LLC
address: 909 Little Cove Rd, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: High-energy, family-friendly dinner theater in a rustic barn with stadium seating & Southern fare.
detail_description: If you're looking for an exhilarating evening filled with adventure and delicious food, look no further than Pirates Voyage Dinner & Show in Pigeon Forge, TN. This high-energy dinner theater takes place in a charming rustic barn featuring stadium seating that enhances the experience. Join the legendary pirate Blackbeard and his trusty quartermaster Calico Jack as they lead their crewsthe Crimson and Sapphirein an epic battle across land, sea, and sky.
name: Pirates Voyage Dinner & Show

detail_description: If you're seeking an exhilarating way to explore the outdoors, consider visiting Scenic Helicopter Tours Ticket & Information Center. They have been providing scenic helicopter tours of the Great Smoky Mountains National Park and surrounding areas for over 50 years. Whether it's your first time in a helicopter or you want to admire the Smokies from above, their comfortable aircraft can accommodate you and your group. From Mount Le Conte to Douglas Lake, their tours offer a unique perspective of the Smoky Mountains.
name: Scenic Helicopter Tours Ticket & Information Center

excerpt: Themed Christmas decorations & gifts, plus photos with Santa, seasonal candy & festive outfits.
detail_description: Nestled near the West Prong Little Pigeon River, The Christmas Place is a festive wonderland that celebrates the holiday spirit all year round. The Inn at Christmas Place, an enchanting hotel with Bavarian architecture, offers a magical experience with its vibrant decorations and regular themed events. Guests can enjoy Singing Santa performances and a musical glockenspiel playing Christmas carols. The hotel also features 24-hour indoor pool access and a hot tub.
name: The Christmas Place

detail_description: Mountain Valley Winery is a part of the Rocky Top Wine Trail, Tennessee's first and most popular wine trail. Established in 2008, it now includes five wineries across Sevierville and Pigeon Forge. Mountain Valley Winery, founded by Don Collier in 1991, focuses on producing top-quality sweet fruit wines and has become one of the largest wineries in the state.
name: Mountain Valley Winery

detail_description: Rowdy Bear's Smoky Mountain Snowpark in Pigeon Forge is a unique amusement park featuring the world's first Power Coaster, an outdoor tubing hill, and axe throwing lanes. The Laser Gun Coaster is a suspended coaster with 2-seater cars equipped with laser guns to shoot at targets. The park also offers the Alpine Coaster and Mountain Glider in Gatlinburg, utilizing the natural topography for their attractions.
name: Rowdy Bear's Smoky Mountain Snowpark

detail_description: Beyond the Lens! Family Fun is a 20,000 square foot museum in Pigeon Forge that offers an array of interactive exhibits for all ages. Visitors can enjoy over 150 interactive displays, including virtual reality rides, escape rooms, and a pop culture walk-through. One highlight is the FlyRide experience, an immersive theater ride with motion seats that takes you on a journey across the United States.
name: Beyond the Lens! Family Fun

detail_description: Embark on an unforgettable journey through the untamed splendor of nature with Smoky Mountains Pink Jeep Tours. Ride through the mountain terrain, cross streams, and witness spectacular views of the Smoky Mountains while enjoying plenty of photo opportunities. Whether you opt for a guided tour or a family adventure in a Slingshot, you'll have the chance to explore the area like never before.
name: Smoky Mountains Pink Jeep Tours

detail_description: Embark on an extraordinary adventure at Sky Pirates of Mermaid Bay, a captivating miniature golf experience that transports you to an enchanting world beneath the sea. With 18 holes indoors and another 18 on the rooftop, this immersive attraction offers a delightful escape for visitors of all ages. Encounter friendly mermaids, lively pirates, and meticulously designed courses that promise an unforgettable time. The well-maintained facility ensures a clean and enjoyable environment for everyone.
name: Sky Pirates of Mermaid Bay Mini Golf

excerpt: Speedy go-kart racetrack with hairpin turns & a retro-themed, neon-lit arcade with 150 games.
detail_description: Rockin' Raceway Arcade is a thrilling destination in Pigeon Forge that offers an exhilarating go-kart racetrack with hairpin turns and a retro-themed, neon-lit arcade featuring over 150 games. The arcade, designed like a giant jukebox, provides classic-style gaming fun for visitors of all ages. Guests can enjoy the excitement of winning tickets to redeem for fantastic prizes at the redemption center while experiencing the buzz and whirl of lights, bells, and whistles.
name: Rockin' Raceway Arcade

excerpt: Visitors purchase play cards for access to video games, plus prize draws & snacks like ribs & fries.
detail_description: Located at The Island in Pigeon Forge, Arcade City offers a wide array of arcade games and activities for visitors to enjoy. From classic video games to Wizard of Oz themed machines, there's something for everyone. Visitors can purchase play cards to access the various games and have the chance to win prizes. In addition to the arcade machines, guests can also try their hand at shooting hoops or aim for high scores. The venue provides a nostalgic yet modern gaming experience suitable for all ages.
name: Arcade City Pigeon Forge
address: 131 The Island Dr #1105, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: Boutique distillery offering flavored spirits, tastings & a gift shop in an old farm supply store.
detail_description: Old Forge Distillery is a boutique distillery located in Pigeon Forge, inspired by the city's historic past and its namesake iron forge. Using pure mountain spring water and freshly ground grains, they produce a variety of spirits including their signature 1830 Original Unaged Corn Moonshine, paying homage to the area's history. The distillery combines old-fashioned methods with modern knowledge to create award-winning moonshine, whiskey, vodka, rum, gin and more.
name: Old Forge Distillery
address: 170 Old Mill Ave, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: Riverside park dedicated to veterans, with a gazebo, walking trail, monuments & community events.
detail_description: Patriot Park is a riverside park in Pigeon Forge, dedicated to veterans from Sevier County. It features a gazebo, walking trail, and monuments honoring veterans. The park hosts various community events and is located near the Old Mill Square. Visitors can conveniently access the park by parking at nearby offices and obtaining an all-day access bracelet for a nominal fee. Additionally, there are multiple trolley routes available for exploring the area without the hassle of driving and parking.
name: Patriot Park
address: 186 Old Mill Ave, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: Local winery producing French, German & fruit wines, with complimentary tastings & tours.
detail_description: Embark on a delightful wine-tasting journey along the Rocky Top Wine Trail, featuring six charming wineries offering over 70 unique wines. Start at any of the wineries to receive a free passport and enjoy complimentary tastings. As you visit each location, collect stamps in your passport for the chance to receive special gifts. From French and German-style wines to fruit wines, there's a wide variety of flavors to savor.
name: Rocky Top Wine Trail

excerpt: Themed theater performances presented together with a set dinner of American comfort food.
detail_description: Located in Pigeon Forge, Tennessee, the Great Smoky Mountain Murder Mystery Dinner Show offers a unique experience of comedy murder mystery shows accompanied by a delectable three-course meal. With three different rotating shows throughout the week, this dinner theater provides entertainment for everyone's interests. The themed performances are filled with comedy and even involve audience participation.
name: Great Smoky Mountain Murder Mystery Dinner Show
address: 2682 Teaster Ln, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: Kitschy, locally owned daytime eatery known for its down-home American breakfast specials.
detail_description: Sawyer's Farmhouse Breakfast is a charming, locally owned restaurant in Pigeon Forge that has gained popularity for its classic American breakfast offerings. The menu features a variety of mouthwatering options such as crepes, Belgian waffles, and made-from-scratch pancakes with delicious syrups and compotes. Additionally, they serve lunch items like burgers, sandwiches, and salads all day long.
name: Sawyer's Farmhouse Breakfast

excerpt: Museum of the "Dukes of Hazzard" TV show with indoor go-kart & mini-golf, run by actor Ben Jones.
detail_description: Cooter's Place Pigeon Forge is a museum and store dedicated to the iconic TV show 'The Dukes of Hazzard.' Founded by Ben Jones, who portrayed Cooter Davenport on the show, this attraction features exhibits and memorabilia from the series.
name: Cooter's Place Pigeon Forge
address: 177 E Wears Valley Rd # 23, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

detail_description: Located in the scenic Smoky Mountains, Axe House Tavern in Pigeon Forge offers an exhilarating axe-throwing experience for all ages. As an affiliate of the World Axe Throwing League, it provides a safe and regulated environment for this fast-growing sport. The venue is family-friendly and ensures that everyone, including kids, can participate. Visitors praise the helpful staff who provide guidance on axe throwing techniques and even recommend delicious food options like bourbon wings.
name: Axe House Tavern - Pigeon Forge

excerpt: This fun-park features multiple go-kart tracks, a video arcade, carnival games & thrill rides.
detail_description: Fast Tracks is an amusement park in Pigeon Forge that offers a thrilling experience with multiple go-kart tracks, a video arcade, carnival games, and thrill rides. The park features a three-story elevated racetrack and CAN-AM racing. Visitors can enjoy three different go-kart tracks: the Elevated Track, Pro Track, and Junior Track. Many visitors have praised the fun and excitement of the go-kart rides at Fast Tracks.
name: Fast Tracks

excerpt: Casual dinner-theater destination spotlighting musical performances & simple American meals.
detail_description: The Grand Majestic Theater is a popular dinner-theater spot featuring musical performances and classic American meals. Terry Evanswood, a talented magician and performer, offers seasonal shows that provide unique content every time. The most popular show, Soul of Motown, gets the audience excited with hit songs that have them clapping and dancing. Other shows include Magic of Terry Evanswood and Johnny Cash and Elvis hits by Lou Vuto.
name: Grand Majestic Theater

detail_description: The Mountain Mile is a sprawling entertainment complex located in Pigeon Forge, offering a wide array of activities for visitors. From thrilling rides at the Mountain Monster to shopping at the Tower Shops, there's something for everyone. Indulge in delectable treats from Cream & Sugar Sweet Shoppe, gear up for outdoor adventures at REI, or find stylish footwear at Nike.
name: The Mountain Mile
address: 2655 Teaster Ln, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA
